name: Light halloween
description:
Light halloween is a simple arcade game designed for your entertainment, but with one important detail, there is nothing dark in this game, as is usually done in halloween games. It changes the game and breaks the stereotypes that a Halloween game can only be dark and gloomy

The game was made to jam: https://itch.io/jam/halloween-supreme-3
